title: Chinese phone manufacturer logo
content:
Hi! I need help identifying the font used in this logo. Thanks so much!

Font: 

 Space Colony 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142900/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142900/http:/typophile.com/files/image_208.jpg) | 10.61 KB |
author: Miralina

comments.content:
Most likely custom, but these two typefaces come close (with a bit of editing):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/space-colony/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142900/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/space-colony/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/space-colony/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/neuropol-x/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142900/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/neuropol-x/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/neuropol-x/")
That's it!! Space colony is perfect. You are amazing thank you so much!
